name: Jam Attempt
description:
Summery:

Gameboy stylized zombie survival, programmed in about 15 hours.

This is my submission for a private 48h Game Jam (Theme: Powerless). First time releasing a game you can somewhat play - yay!

It is more like a demo rather than a finished game. You can walk from one room to another, visit a zombie who is following you. A simple "punch" animation is implemented but does nothing at all.

Controls:

WASD - Walk
N - Action

The initial idea:

First of all: I will continue development.

You are a poor guy who awakes in a dungeon filled with zombies and other monsters. You are trying to escape using weapons laying around. But beware! Every item you collect will slow you down, so there is a tradeoff between gaining more power with items and loosing walking speed making you less powerful.
